content:
TITLE: Importing Adyen Web in JavaScript
DESCRIPTION: Code snippet showing how to import the Adyen Web package and its associated styles in a JavaScript application
SOURCE: https://github.com/adyen/adyen-web/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import { AdyenCheckout } from '@adyen/adyen-web';
import '@adyen/adyen-web/styles/adyen.css';
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Adyen Web via NPM
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Adyen Web package using npm package manager
SOURCE: https://github.com/adyen/adyen-web/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
npm install @adyen/adyen-web --save
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Environment Variables for Adyen Integration
DESCRIPTION: Required environment variables that need to be set in the env.local file for Adyen integration. These include merchant account details, API keys, and client configuration.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adyen/adyen-web/blob/main/examples/nextjs/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
MERCHANT_ACCOUNT=
CHECKOUT_API_KEY=
CHECKOUT_API_VERSION=
NEXT_PUBLIC_CLIENT_KEY=
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Environment Variables for Adyen Web in Angular
DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to set up environment variables for Adyen Web integration in an Angular project. It includes essential configuration parameters such as clientKey, merchantAccount, apiVersion, and apiKey.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adyen/adyen-web/blob/main/examples/angular/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
export const environment = {
    production: false,
    clientKey: 'test_L6HTEOAXQBCZ...',
    merchantAccount: 'TestMerchant...',
    apiVersion: 'v71',
    apiKey: 'AQEthmfxKo7MbhFLw0m/n3Q...'
};
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Environment Variables for Adyen Web v6 with Nuxt3
DESCRIPTION: Example .env file configuration for Adyen Web v6 integration with Nuxt3. The configuration includes server-side variables (Checkout API key, API version, merchant account) and client-side variables (client key) needed for the integration to work properly.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adyen/adyen-web/blob/main/examples/nuxt/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
# SERVER 
NUXT_CHECKOUT_API_KEY=AQEthmff3VfI5eG...
NUXT_API_VERSION=v71
NUXT_MERCHANT_ACCOUNT=TestMerchant...

# CLIENT
NUXT_PUBLIC_CLIENT_KEY=test_L6HTEOAXQB...
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Customizing Adyen Web Styles
DESCRIPTION: Example of how to override default styles using CSS variables
SOURCE: https://github.com/adyen/adyen-web/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: css
CODE:
```
:root {
    --adyen-sdk-color-background-secondary: #f7f7f8;
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Importing Custom Styles
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript code showing how to import both default and custom CSS styles
SOURCE: https://github.com/adyen/adyen-web/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import '@adyen/adyen-web/styles/adyen.css';
import './override.css';
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Example Environment Variable Configuration for Adyen
DESCRIPTION: Example values for the required environment variables, showing the format and structure of each configuration parameter.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adyen/adyen-web/blob/main/examples/nextjs/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
MERCHANT_ACCOUNT=MyTestMerchantAccount
CHECKOUT_API_KEY=AQEthmfxKoMm/n3...
CHECKOUT_API_VERSION=v71
NEXT_PUBLIC_CLIENT_KEY=test_L6HTEOAX...
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: URL Parameters for Payment Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Example URL structure for customizing payment parameters including amount, country code, and shopper locale.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adyen/adyen-web/blob/main/examples/nextjs/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
http://localhost:3020/?amount=2000&countryCode=US&shopperLocale=nl-NL
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Development Environment Setup
DESCRIPTION: Commands for setting up the development environment after cloning the repository
SOURCE: https://github.com/adyen/adyen-web/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
yarn install
```

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
yarn build
```

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
yarn start
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running the Adyen Web v6 with Nuxt3 Project
DESCRIPTION: Command to run the Adyen Web v6 with Nuxt3 project in development mode. This starts the web application on http://localhost:3000.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adyen/adyen-web/blob/main/examples/nuxt/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining Spacing Variables in CSS for Adyen Web SDK
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines CSS custom properties for spacing in the Adyen Web SDK. It provides a range of spacing values from 0px to 64px, which can be used for various dimensional purposes throughout the SDK, ensuring consistency in layout and design.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adyen/adyen-web/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: CSS
CODE:
```
:root {
  --adyen-sdk-spacer-000: 0px;
  --adyen-sdk-spacer-010: 2px;
  --adyen-sdk-spacer-020: 4px;
  --adyen-sdk-spacer-030: 6px;
  --adyen-sdk-spacer-040: 8px;
  --adyen-sdk-spacer-050: 10px;
  --adyen-sdk-spacer-060: 12px;
  --adyen-sdk-spacer-070: 16px;
  --adyen-sdk-spacer-080: 20px;
  --adyen-sdk-spacer-100: 32px;
  --adyen-sdk-spacer-110: 40px;
  --adyen-sdk-spacer-120: 48px;
  --adyen-sdk-spacer-130: 56px;
  --adyen-sdk-spacer-140: 64px;
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining CSS Variables for Adyen SDK in CSS
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines various CSS custom properties (variables) used in the Adyen SDK for dimensions, border radii, border widths, and box shadows. These variables are used throughout the SDK to maintain consistent styling.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adyen/adyen-web/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: CSS
CODE:
```
--adyen-sdk-spacer-090: 24px;
--adyen-sdk-border-radius-xs: 2px;
--adyen-sdk-border-radius-s: 4px;
--adyen-sdk-border-radius-m: 8px;
--adyen-sdk-border-radius-l: 12px;
--adyen-sdk-border-radius-xl: 24px;
--adyen-sdk-border-width-s: 1px;
--adyen-sdk-border-width-m: 2px;
--adyen-sdk-border-width-l: 3px;
--adyen-sdk-shadow-low: 0px 2px 4px rgba(0, 17, 44, 0.04), 0px 1px 2px rgba(0, 17, 44, 0.02);
```
